import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-after-sign-in-employer', templateUrl: './after-sign-in-admin.component.html', styleUrls: ['./after-sign-in-admin.component.css'] }) export class AfterSignInAdminComponent { }

    Location: Chicago, IL
